uk.ac.ebi.mdk.ui.edit.annotation
Interface AnnotationEditor<A extends Annotation>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAnnotationEditor, AuthorAnnotationEditor, BasicFieldEditor, BooleanAnnotationEditor, CrossReferenceEditor, DoubleAnnotationEditor, FlagEditor, GibbsEnergyEditor, StringAnnotationEditor
public interface AnnotationEditor<A extends Annotation>

AnnotationEditor 2012.02.14
Provides a description that other annotation editors need to build too

Version:
$Rev$ : Last Changed $Date$
Author:
johnmay, $Author$ (this version)

Method Detail

setAnnotation

void setAnnotation(A annotation)
Set the annotation for this editor. This method will setup the GUI editor to display information of from an existing annotation that can be edited

Parameters:
annotation - the annotation to set

newAnnotation

A newAnnotation()
Access the annotation with appropriate values of the annotation set. Note invoking this method provides a new instance of the annotation and not and edited version of that passed in setAnnotation

Returns:
configured annotation

newInstance

AnnotationEditor newInstance()
Provides a new instance of the annotation editor. This is primarily used in factories for creating new instances

Returns:
new instance of the this editor

getComponent

JComponent getComponent()
Access the JComponent for this editor. This will be displayed in the JTable.

Returns:
